parameters.name: leftCol
parameters.doc: The x coordinate of the top left slot

parameters.name: topRow
parameters.doc: The y coordinate of the top left slot

doc.summary: Places the player inventory slots into the container.
doc.text: Places the player inventory slots into the container.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.doc: The inventory of the slot

parameters.name: index
parameters.doc: The index of the first slot

parameters.name: x
parameters.doc: The x coordinate of the top left slot

parameters.name: y
parameters.doc: The y coordinate of the top left slot

parameters.name: horAmount
parameters.doc: The amount of slots in horizontal direction

parameters.name: dx
parameters.doc:
The space between two slots in horizontal direction. Should not be less than 16 or
you create overlapping slots. Most of the time this is 18

parameters.name: verAmount
parameters.doc: The amount of slots in vertical direction

parameters.name: dy
parameters.doc:
The space between two slots in vertical direction. Should not be less than 16 or
you create overlapping slots. Most of the time this is 18

parameters.name: slotFactory

A factory to create a slot. This could be SlotItemHandler::new
or SlotOutputOnly::new for output slots.

doc.text:
A base class for menus. Provides some utilities that are useful for any type
of menu. When using this it's important to register the player inventory slots through
#layoutPlayerInventorySlots(int, int) and after all the other slots.
